Experiences

March 2020 - Present
Rakuten Kobo, Tokyo Japan

Developing an e-book, manga reader mobile application using ReactNative. We need to migrate the native Kobo app to ReactNative solution.
Challenges:

  • There is a performance issue in QuickScroll feature where blank space appears too frequently which affects the user experience.
  • The sync takes too much time compared to the native app
  • The rotation of the library doesn’t resize for a few seconds

Software Engineer

Dec 2018 – Feb 2020
​Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus Corp., Tokyo Japan

Working on a web application for tracking vehicles using Java and ReactJS. We provide a management solution for all FUSO vehicle purchasers. With this website, users can track their vehicle status such as fuel, energy (for electric vehicles), geofencing notifications, etc.
Challenges:

  • Being an external employee has some hinder on trying to achieve the tasks. Constantly seeking for information about the inner system to have a better understanding of the api

Senior Backend Engineer

Sep 2018 – Dec 2018
Amanotes Ltd., Vietnam HCMC

Maintaining and automating processes into services. Tech stack: AWS EC2, DynamoDB, S3, Jenkins, CI/CD. We want to bring music to everyone through games, so that everyone can enjoy music while playing games. Famous games are: Magic Tiles 3, Dancing Road.
Challenges:

  • Need to be available most of the time in case of server issues
  • The team is too small, only two people in the team. Human resource are scarce.

Software Engineer

Jun 2016 – Aug 2018
DXC Technology Vietnam

Responsible for reviewing, designing, and developing activities relating to Java, NodeJS applications in various projects and teams related to insurance The team provides many services supporting insurance business. I had a chance to work in a web application built with Java and AngularJS that supports buying insurance online. Later, I became the main developer in charge of building the Questionnaire microservice using NodeJS. Later, I integrated that api into Alexa to promote getting an insurance quotation with ease.
Challenges:

  • Mentoring new comers
  • Training JavaScript and AngularJS for fresh grads training courses
  • Taking over the Questionnaire component. When I took over, the component has performance issue regarding memory leak and slowness due to csv file operations
